string.value: |It’s a death-trap. I won’t go there without a reason.
|It seems to be the very place, Homer was talking about. I’ll cross the swamp here.
|The old man was telling the truth. There was a solid ground under the thin layer of mud. I wonder what awaits me beyond the swamp.
GUARD|Keep away! Any hostile actions will result in your death!
|You are transporting the cargo that I need. Give it up and I will pay for it!
GUARD|Are you trying to bribe us? How dare you!
|Well, let’s do it bad way. Free the prisoner and get out of here before I get angry!
GUARD| To arms! We’ll show this bastard what’s for!
|You asked for it. I must not hit the prisoner’s car; the others may go to Hell!
|What are you waiting for? Get in the car! Hurry, they may have called for the reinforcements.
LEADER|Thanks for liberating me, stranger, but who are you? I am not sure I can trust you...
|I made a deal with your fighters. I set you free, they give me something I need. And I already kept my part of the bargain.
|Oops, the prisoner’s car exploded. The leader is dead and I have nothing else to offer to the extremists.
|Guess, I have to simply capture that warehouse. Piece of cake!
CLAW|Intruder, Alert!
|What the?.. Why the hell would anyone build such a monster?
|I see, this creature is guarding the Sea gate. Well, I have to bypass him. Not sure if the bullets will damage him. There must be some trick in defeating him.
|This is the right place, but I see no gates around... Was it all in vain?
|Wait a minute, the key is getting warm. Something is going out of the water! Ancient people were definitely crazy, creating such monsters. Looks like another battle is ahead.

|Wait, it doesn’t attack. Looks like it is inviting me to enter its mouth. I see, that’s the Sea gate! In the belly of the monster-fish I will travel to the Oracle’s land. Anyway, I have nothing to lose. Full speed ahead!
|These bandits won’t trouble traders no more!
|Now I must inform Ohlm’s people that the warehouse is free.
Do you wish to travel to another region?
I don’t know the way, so I’ll better stay here.
There’s something strange about this place. I don’t want to go there.
